text: this is a story of misinformation fear
and panic April 2013
an Indian self-proclaimed prophet says a
play will start in pangasinan province
in the Philippines from that will
consume the flesh of man Monday this
week Filipino TV reporters find two
cases of a mysterious flesh-eating
disease in Pangasinan the anchor asks if
this has anything to do with the
prophecy almost 80,000 people then used
a Twitter hashtag pray for pangasinan
many saying they are terrified the panga
nurse and Department of Health have told
us that the report was a hoax for these
were two old cases of leprosy and
psoriasis it was not the intention of
the company and of the newscast to sow
fear as a matter of fact what they
wanted to do is to bring this two case
studies to the attention of the people
and of government officials I blame the
network for sensationalizing the report
my aunt was terrified even my friends
and Twitter was terrified
don't hashtag pray for pangasinan said
one widely retweeted remark instead
hashtag pray for better journalism
